description: Fix the specified clump velocities. As a result, clump motion is constant in the specified directions (fixed velocities are not updated during cycling).

keywords.name: velocity
keywords.description: Fix all components of translational velocity

keywords.name: velocity-z
keywords.description: Fix z-component of translational velocity (3D only)

keywords.name: spin
keywords.description: Fix all components of angular velocity

keywords.name: spin-x
keywords.description: Fix x-component of angular velocity (3D only)

keywords.name: spin-y
keywords.description: Fix y-component of angular velocity (3D only)

keywords.name: spin-z
keywords.description: Fix z-component of angular velocity (3D only)

notes: Multiple velocity components can be fixed simultaneously
Fixed velocities remain constant during cycling (not updated by force calculations)
Use clump free command to release fixed velocities

examples.command: clump fix velocity-x velocity-y spin range id 1 4 not
examples.description: Fix the x- and y- components of velocity and the rotational velocity of all clumps except those with ID 1, 2, 3, and 4
Fix the x-component of velocity of clump with ID 1
Fix z-velocity for clumps in 'platen' group (common in compression tests)

examples.command: clump fix velocity spin range all
examples.description: Fix all translational and rotational velocity components for all clumps (fully constrained)

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Clump.set_fix(component, True) where component: 0=X, 1=Y, 2=Z, 3=RX, 4=RY, 5=RZ - requires iteration: for c in itasca.clump.list(): c.set_fix(component, True)
